mapper.select: select tci.company_name, tci.company_color, tsi.service_name, tsi.service_color, tmc.main_category_name, tmc.main_category_color from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id left join tb_table_meta_info ttmi on tsi.service_id = ttmi.service_id left join tb_main_category tmc on ttmi.main_category_id = tmc.main_category_id group by tci.company_name, tci.company_color, tsi.service_name, tsi.service_color, tmc.main_category_name, tmc.main_category_color order by 1,3;

select tci.company_name, tci.company_color, tsi.service_name, tsi.service_color, tmc.main_category_name, tmc.main_category_color, tsc.sub_category_name, tsc.sub_category_color from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id left join tb_table_meta_info ttmi on tsi.service_id = ttmi.service_id left join tb_main_category tmc on ttmi.main_category_id = tmc.main_category_id left join tb_sub_category tsc on ttmi.sub_category_id = tsc.sub_category_id group by tci.company_name, tci.company_color, tsi.service_name, tsi.service_color, tmc.main_category_name, tmc.main_category_color, tsc.sub_category_name, tsc.sub_category_color order by 1,3,5;

select tmc.main_category_name from tb_company_info tci join tb_service_info tsi on tci.company_id = tsi.company_id left join tb_table_meta_info ttmi on tsi.service_id = ttmi.service_id left join tb_main_category tmc on ttmi.main_category_id = tmc.main_category_id where tmc.main_category_name is not null group by tmc.main_category_name order by COUNT(*) DESC
